headline: The 1 Thing You Need to Know Before Buying UPS Stock
summary: There are only a couple of weeks left before the end of the first quarter, so it's time to consider whether UPS (NYSE: UPS) stock is a buy before the company issues its earnings results on April 29.  There's no point tiptoeing around the elephant in the room: Package delivery is a cyclical activity.  Unfortunately, several management teams at industrial and transportation companies have discussed feeling some near-term weakness.
